titles.title: Providing the amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Energy and Commerce in the One Hundred Twelfth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: Provides amounts for the expenses of the House Committee on Energy and Commerce for the 112th Congress.
